  • Constructor Details

    • BoundingBox

      public BoundingBox​(float xmin, float xmax, float ymin, float ymax, int color)
      Creates a new bounding box at set dimensions and color. Note: Should verify that xmin ≤ xmax and ymin ≤ ymax
      Parameters:
      xmin - left bound of the box
      xmax - right bound of the box
      ymin - lower bound of the box
      ymax - upper bound of the box
      color - color of the box's contour

    • BoundingBox

      public BoundingBox​(int color)
      Creates an empty bounding box with the specified contour color
      Parameters:
      color - color of the box's contour

    • BoundingBox

      public BoundingBox()
      Creates an empty black box
